document.full_text: cam ward made 42 saves for his second shutout in a month, and the carolina hurricanes beat the detroit red wings, 3-0, on wednesday to stay in the thick of the eastern conference playoff race.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: carolina tops detroit, but still needs help to make playoffs
